column1: Ainairos was an Elf of Valinor. He was one of the Solosimpi that escaped the Kinslaying at Alqualondë in which his brother was killed.

column3: along with many of his people
column4: became bitter and resentful of the Noldoli. When Manwë summoned the Valar and the Eldar to a council
column5: Ainairos was the one to speak against the Exiles and for the concealment of Valinor
column6: and the most that were gathered there agreed with him
column7: desiring neither Melko nor the Noldoli to return.

column1: The character was originally named Oivárin before being changed to Ainairos.
Category:Characters in The Book of Lost Tales
